price: Lalle ne waɗanda* suka ce: "Ubangijinmu Allah ne," sa'an nan suka daidaitu, to, bãbu wani tsõro a kansu, kuma bã zã su yi baƙin ciki ba.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
footnotes: * Yã fara da wanda ya yi wa kansa nasĩha, kuma ya yi aiki da ita, to, shĩ mai gargaɗi ne. Haka kuma mai yin nasĩha ga mutãne, shĩ mã mai gargaɗi ne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
